name: Hunt for Daltonga
description:
Help Captain Chirple in his quest for Daltonga! Navigate the treacherous open seas, fight pirates, and collect secret treasures!

---

Features:

  • Exciting high seas combat
  • Randomly generated worlds
  • Dynamic soundtrack
  • Day-Night cycle
  • An open world to explore

Controls:

  • Move with the mouse and W/S keys
  • Check with Map with the M key
  • Boost with SHIFT
  • Aim with the Right Mouse button
  • Fire with the Left Mouse button
